DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate near intermediate visual outcome patient undergone routine cataract surgery ( removal cloudy crystalline lens ) phacoemulsification ( break-up removal cloudy lens ) monofocal IOL ( plastic lens implant replace eye 's natural lens ) placement capsular bag least one eye .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Evaluation Near Intermediate Visual Outcomes With Monofocal Intraocular Lenses : The Mast Study
DOC.criteria: Male female patient least 18 year age Patients underwent routine cataract surgery phacoemulsification monofocal iol placement capsular bag least one eye within last 36 month At least 1 month postop followup evaluation All Patients must DCVA 20/25 good
